title: Nalin Bandara, SJBs new Chief of Operations
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Kurunegala District Parliamentarian Nalin Bandara was appointed as the Chief of Operations of the Samagi Jana Balavegaya on Thursday (2).
His appointment came after the position was left vacant following the exit of Harin Fernando, who accepted a position in Government.
